alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:50PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lawrence County through 115 PM MDT... At 1249 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spearfish, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Onge, Central City and Deadwood. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 5 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
